reviewText: The Drive Thru History videos are excellent!  My kids (age 7 and 5), my husband and I have learned a lot by watching this video series.  The host, Dave Stotts, does an excellent job of making history come alive with his unique storytelling technique and taking viewers where the historical events occurred.  He also has a silly sense of humor that kids (and parents!) will enjoy.
This is done in such a "cool" and accurate way,making history real and exciting . Kids love it and don't even realize they are learning. They ask to watch it over and over.
This is a wonderful introduction to American history. I am going to use it homeschooling with my 4 this year. I am so excited. They love the videos.
It's good, just not great in my opinion. I ordered it for my friend who thinks it is wonderful and informative and entertaining.

If you like history, this is so interesting and fun to watch.  Kids will benefit from all the material and the way it is presented making it enjoyable and NOT boring.  I would recommend this to anyone.  I have thoroughly enjoyed watching them, plus repeat watching.

These are a fun, and truthful way to learn about history.  Dave Stotts is interesting and funny as he relates important historical information--much that is not commonly taught--in an engaging way that my whole family loves.  He has just enough silly humor (sometimes gross) that my boys absolutely love it, but it doesn't turn the rest of us off.  I highly recommend this series for anyone who loves, or wants to love, history.
These are great for homeschoolers.  Kids enjoy watching the videos more than reading the stories in a book.  Great for reinforcing what they did read, too.
Enjoyed watching and learning about history from these videos
This is amazing and so interesting! My son struggles with learning but is intrigued with the combination of the facts and the actual locations. He looks forward to watching!
These are all so good and make great gifts also.  The whole series is excellent.

We are enjoying this in our homeschool as a fun beginning framework for our study of American History. It is fun to watch and very fast paced. The kids usually have one or two things in each episode that they want to know more about and so they start researching on their own. I always love when that happens. :)
These are top rated for a reason. We now understand why. The learning is unparalleled. Very impressed.
Delivery time was so fast! The product is fantastic!
My kids loved these DVD's, which are entertaining and engaging for kids.
